featured-projects.title: AI Assistant Platform
featured-projects.description: Conversational platform with GPT-4 integration for automated customer support
featured-projects.longDescription: A complete AI chatbot system with React interface, Node.js backend and OpenAI API integration. Includes conversation management, persistent memory and real-time analytics.

personalinfo.name: Enea Frontera
personalinfo.tagline: Building modern solutions with AI, Cloud and DevOps
personalinfo.bio: Full-stack developer with a strong focus on modern and AI-ready technologies. Experienced in Angular, TypeScript and Business Central, now specializing in cloud-native architectures, DevOps practices and AI/LLM integration.

home.featuredProjectsDescription: A selection of my most significant projects demonstrating skills in AI, cloud and full-stack development
home.techStackDescription: Modern technologies with which I build scalable, performant and innovative solutions

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: I'm a Full-Stack Developer passionate about innovative technologies, with a particular focus on Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Computing and DevOps practices. My experience ranges from frontend development with modern frameworks like React and Angular, to backend with Node.js, up to the integration of enterprise systems like Business Central.
about.paragraph2: In recent years I have specialized in integrating Large Language Models (LLM) and AI technologies into business applications, creating solutions that automate complex processes and improve user experience. I strongly believe in the importance of writing clean, testable and maintainable code, following established best practices and design patterns.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy staying up to date on the latest tech trends, contributing to open source projects and sharing knowledge through blog posts and mentoring.

contact.title: Get in
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting conversations.
contact.subjectPlaceholder: What do you want to talk about?
